description:
The shuffling of members according to when they can record continues! Aoi and Rin duel over a "new dentist". Then the original members continue their "location recording" from last week and go on a Ferris wheel, which terrifies Hiina!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Let`s Play with Dentists and Ferris Wheels
歯医者と観覧車で遊ぼう
